title: Fully-blind Neural Network Based Equalization for Severe Nonlinear Distortions in 112 Gbit/s Passive Optical Networks. (arXiv:2401.09579v1 [eess.SP])
abstract: We demonstrate and evaluate a fully-blind digital signal processing (DSP) chain for 100G passive optical networks (PONs), and analyze different equalizer topologies based on neural networks with low hardware complexity.
context:
Title: Fully-blind Neural Network Based Equalization for Severe Nonlinear Distortions in 112 Gbit/s Passive Optical Networks. (arXiv:2401.09579v1 [eess.SP])
Abstract: We demonstrate and evaluate a fully-blind digital signal processing (DSP) chain for 100G passive optical networks (PONs), and analyze different equalizer topologies based on neural networks with low hardware complexity.
translated_title: 用于112 Gbit/s被动光网络中严重非线性失真的全盲神经网络均衡器
translated_abstract: 我们展示并评估了用于100G被动光网络(PON)的完全盲目的数字信号处理(DSP)链，以及基于神经网络的不同均衡器拓扑结构，具有低硬件复杂度。
tldr: 该论文提出了一种对于112 Gbit/s被动光网络中严重非线性失真的全盲神经网络均衡器，并评估了其性能。这种均衡器采用低硬件复杂度的神经网络拓扑结构。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a fully-blind neural network equalizer for severe nonlinear distortions in 112 Gbit/s passive optical networks, and evaluates its performance. The equalizer adopts neural network topologies with low hardware complexity.
